alert.note: Alert for Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Lodgepole Creek, Southern Nebraska Panhandle; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument; Pine Ridge, Nebraska National Forest (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 18 at 3:08AM CDT until April 19 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH EARLY TUESDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 434, 435, 436, AND 437... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH EARLY TUESDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 434, 435, 436, AND 437... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Tuesday afternoon through early Tuesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 434, 435, 436 and 437. * WIND...South to southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum 12 to 17 percent. * HAINES...5 to 6. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions may develop. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
